title: Molded Production Unit, "Design 10", 1979
creditline: Gift of David and Gregory Wallance
description: Complete molded white plastic production unit consisting of 3 knives, 3 forks, 3 soup spoons, 3 teaspoons attached to long center sprue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Molded Production Unit, "Design 10", 1979.
1979. Lexan polycarbonate thermoplastic resin. Gift of David and Gregory Wallance. 1991-81-755.
